name: .LID File Extension
summary: Learn about .LID files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Stores album information for photos and videos captured with a Kodak EasyShare camera; defines what album each photo or video is stored in; used to organize and keep track of different sets of photos and videos.

content: LID files are used by the EasyShare software included with the camera. They are saved in the same directory as the image files, but do not contain actual image data.
NOTE: Kodak discontinued the development of the EasyShare program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
